relation: Du bist ein Fall für meine Träume

textAfterTable: 15 Songs Biography Formed: 1964 in Knittingen, Germany Genre: German Pop Years Active: '80s, '90s, '00s, '10s Die Flippers were a veritable institution of German pop, with a catalog of hits that spans across five decades. Manfred Durban, Claus Backhaus, Franz Halmich, Manfred Mössner, Manfred Hehl, and Hans Springer formed the earliest incarnation of the group in Knittlingen in 1964, performing as simply "Die Dancing Band." In the years to follow, the sextet emerged as one of the most popular acts on the local live circuit, albeit with several lineup changes: Bernd Hengst replaced Springer, Roland Bausert...
